stupidFriendly.title: Software Engineering Intern
techtack: Languages and Frameworks: Python (TurboGears 2.0), JavaScript (jQuery 1.7), HTML, CSS
Tools: jQuery for Front-End, MySQL Workbench, TurboGears for Backend development
duties: Documentation of inventory, distribution pages, and an external platform for ticket sales and distribution
Collaboration in creating and maintaining APIs for data management using Python (TurboGears) and JavaScript (jQuery).
Identification and correction of system reliability issues.
achivemens: Improved system reliability by eliminating redundant functions, reducing errors and enhancing system performance by 15%.
Streamlined processes by optimizing code, resulting in better information management and more efficient access for small business merchants.

FletesTransportes.title: Becario
FletesTransportes.description: las actualizaciones del sistema, identificando y corrigiendo proactivamente errores, así como gestionando las actualizaciones de dependencias para asegurar la estabilidad y funcionalidad óptima de la aplicación a lo largo del tiempo.
